Method Detail

execute

void execute(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
             throws CommandArgumentException,
                    CommandPermissionException,
                    CommandUsageException
Execute a command.

Parameters:
sender - The CommandSender using this command.
arguments - Any arguments provided. This should not include any command labels such as command prefixes.
Throws:
CommandArgumentException - if any of the arguments are invalid.
CommandPermissionException - if the player does not have permission to use the command.
CommandUsageException - if the command is being used in an inappropriate way.

getDescription

String getDescription()
Gets the description.

Returns:
the description

getName

String getName()
Gets the name of this command.

Returns:
the name

getUsage

String getUsage()
Gets the usage.

Returns:
the usage

parseArguments

void parseArguments(String[] arguments,
                    org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
                    throws CommandArgumentException
Parse the command arguments.

Parameters:
arguments - the arguments provided by the CommandManager
Throws:
CommandArgumentException - if any of the arguments are invalid.

boolean testPermission(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
